document:
<sentence id="s1" text="Methods: Analysis of publicly available microarray data of oral negative regulation of peptidase activity revealed that bile acid metabolic process was significantly upregulated in tumor tissue compared with normal mucosa.">
<sentence id="s2" text="Results: bile acid metabolic process overexpression was significantly associated with advanced tumor status (li>P=0.001), advanced positive regulation of cysteine-type endopeptidase activity involved in apoptotic process status (li>P=0.036), increased vascular invasion (li>P=0.026) and increased perineural invasion (li>P=0.004).">
